tasks: Characterization of (n-1)-spheres with n+4 vertices having maximal Buchstaber number
methods: GPU-friendly algorithm for obtaining all weak pseudo-manifolds whose facets are all in an input set of facets satisfying given conditions
results: Complete listing of toric colorable seed PL-spheres with a few vertices
Complete characterization of PL-spheres of dimension n-1 with n+4 vertices having maximal Buchstaber numbers
title:
The characterization of $\mathbf{(n-1)}$-spheres with $\mathbf{n+4}$
  vertices having maximal Buchstaber number
abstract: We provide a GPU-friendly algorithm for obtaining all weak pseudo-manifolds whose facets are all in an input set of facets satisfying given conditions. We use it here to completely list up toric colorable seed PL-spheres with a few vertices implying the complete characterization of PL-spheres of dimension $n-1$ with $n+4$ vertices having maximal Buchstaber numbers.
